name: Joana's Projects: Fun House
description:
Joana's Projects: Fun House is a casual games that can be played by two players. This game can be played by using keyboards. 

Players can choose the game that will be played, then they compete to make the highest scores or to be the survivor. Then the lost one  or both should do some workout randomly as the screen display.

Control of the game is using your keyboards, arrow keys, WASD, space key, shift key.

This game is one of the most favorite games of IGSI Gamejam 2020 #Stayathome.
